CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c , "New Business"), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c , "New Business - BOR") ) ,"NB", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c , "Renewal"), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c , "Remarketed at Renewal") ), "RE", "CANCELLED"))
CustomField.label: Accounting Classification
